summary: Patches MERPs Gondorian weapons and shields for Dual Sheath Redux use.
descriptionHtml:
[b]- Description -[/b]

Makes the necessary changes to the shield and weapon meshes for use with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155]Dual Sheath Redux[/url].
[b]
- Requirements -[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43641/?]MERPs Gondorian Armament[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155]Dual Sheath Redux[/url]

[b]- Installation -[/b]

Unpack the contents of the .zip file to your Skyrim\Data directory. Overwrite if prompted.

[b]- Uninstallation -[/b]

Delete the following files from your Skyrim\Data directory.
1) meshes\armor\bgsgondor\gondorshieldOnBack.nif
2) meshes\weapons\bgsgondor\gondorswordLeft.nif
3) meshes\weapons\bgsgondor\gondorswordSheath.nif
4) meshes\weapons\bgsgondor\towerguardswordLeft.nif
5) meshes\weapons\bgsgondor\towerguardswordSheath.nif

[b]- Changelog -[/b]

1.0 - Initial release.

[b]- Credits -[/b]

Thanks toÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1536305]BGSMERP[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1267569]Neovalen[/url] for their great mods!

[b]- Permissions -
[/b]
Any changes done to this file requires permission from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1536305]BGSMERP[/url] in accordance to permissions listed under [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43641/?]MERPs Gondorian Armament[/url].
author: DigitalVixen
